verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5676>across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H4136>opposite<s%> <S%H5489>Suph,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6290>Paran<s%> and <S%H8603>Tophel<s%> and <S%H9227>Laban<s%> and <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%> and <S%H1774>Dizahab.<s%>
It is <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> days' [journey] from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to Kadesh-barnea.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him [to give] to them,

<S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H5221>defeated<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>

<S%H5676>Across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2974>undertook<s%> to <S%H874>expound<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to us at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You have <S%H3427>stayed<s%> <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H7227>enough<s%> at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

<S%H6437>'Turn<s%> and <S%H5265>set<s%> your <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7934>neighbors<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> and in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> and in the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> and by the <S%H3220>seacoast,<s%> <S%H2348><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H7200>'See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>placed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to your fathers, to <S%H1>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H85>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3327>Jacob,<s%> to them and their <S%H3290>descendants<s%> <S%H2233>after<s%> them.'
"And I <S%H559>spoke<s%> to you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> [the burden] of you <S%H905>alone.<s%>

'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> you, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you are this <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

'May the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, <S%H1>increase<s%> you a thousand-fold <S%H3254>more<s%> than you are, and <S%H3254>bless<s%> you, <S%H1288>just<s%> as He has <S%H9201>promised<s%> you!
<S%H351>'How<s%> can I <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2960>load<s%> and <S%H4853>burden<s%> of you and your <S%H7379>strife<s%>?

<S%H3051>'Choose<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>discerning<s%> and <S%H3045>experienced<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them as your <S%H7218>heads.<s%>'
"And you <S%H6030>answered<s%> me and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'The <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>'

"So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H3045>experienced<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H5414>appointed<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%> and of <S%H6235>tens,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

"Then I <S%H6680>charged<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>'Hear<s%> [the cases] <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H251>fellow<s%> <S%H251>countrymen,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>fellow<s%> <S%H251>countryman,<s%> or the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who is with him.

'You shall not <S%H5234>show<s%> <S%H5234>partiality<s%> <S%H6440><s%> in <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H9512>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> alike. You shall not <S%H9076>fear<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is God's. And the <S%H1697>case<s%> that is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H7185>hard<s%> for you, you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> to me, and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.'
"And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> that you should <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"Then we <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7200>saw,<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us; and we <S%H935>came<s%> to Kadesh-barnea.

"And I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, 'You have <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is about to <S%H5414>give<s%> us.

<S%H7200>'See,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>placed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H5927>go<s%> up, <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, has <S%H1>spoken<s%> to you. Do not <S%H1696>fear<s%> or be <S%H3372>dismayed.<s%>'

"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H7126>approached<s%> me and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Let us <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, that they may <S%H2658>search<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> for us, and <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to us <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> we should <S%H5927>go<s%> up, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we shall <S%H935>enter.<s%>'

"And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> me and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> of your <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for each <S%H7626>tribe.<s%>

"And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H7270>spied<s%> it out.

"Then they <S%H3947>took<s%> [some] of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H3381>brought<s%> it <S%H3381>down<s%> to us; and they <S%H7725>brought<s%> us <S%H7725>back<s%> a <S%H1697>report<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is about to <S%H5414>give<s%> us.'
"Yet you were not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%>

and you <S%H7279>grumbled<s%> in your <S%H168>tents<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8135>hates<s%> us, He has <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> us.

<S%H575>'Where<s%> can we <S%H5927>go<s%> up? Our <S%H251>brethren<s%> have made our <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H4549>melt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1419>bigger<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we; the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1419>large<s%> and <S%H1219>fortified<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> And <S%H1571>besides,<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>"'
"Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, 'Do not be <S%H6206>shocked,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> them.

'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you will <S%H1931>Himself<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> on your behalf, <S%H3605>just<s%> <S%H834><s%> as He <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%>

and in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> you, <S%H9201>just<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5375>carries<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1980>walked,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>'
"But for all <S%H2088>this,<s%> you did not <S%H539>trust<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

who <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you on [your] <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H8446>seek<s%> out a <S%H4725>place<s%> for you to <S%H2583>encamp,<s%> in <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> you the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you should <S%H1980>go.<s%>
"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> and He was <S%H7107>angry<s%> and <S%H7650>took<s%> an <S%H7650>oath,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

'Not <S%H376>one<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> generation, shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> your fathers,

<S%H2108>except<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh;<s%> he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and to him and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H1869>set<s%> <S%H1869>foot,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he has <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>fully.<s%>'
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me <S%H1571>also<s%> on your <S%H1558>account,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Not <S%H1571>even<s%> you shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

<S%H3091>'Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him, for he shall cause <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it.

'Moreover, your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> you <S%H559>said<s%> would <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H9185>good<s%> or <S%H9563>evil,<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to them, and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
'But as for you, <S%H6437>turn<s%> around and <S%H5265>set<s%> out for the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>'

"Then you <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> we will indeed <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H3898>fight,<s%> <S%H3605>just<s%> <S%H834><s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.' And <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you <S%H2296>girded<s%> on his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H1951>regarded<s%> it as <S%H1951>easy<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H559>'Say<s%> to them, "Do not <S%H5927>go<s%> up, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3898>fight,<s%> for I am not <S%H7130>among<s%> you; <S%H3808>lest<s%> you be <S%H5062>defeated<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H340>enemies.<s%> "'

"So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you, but you would not <S%H8085>listen.<s%> Instead you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H2102>acted<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country.<s%>

"And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in that <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7122>against<s%> you, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> you as <S%H1682>bees<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H3807>crushed<s%> you from <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

"Then you <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H238>give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to you.
"So you <S%H3427>remained<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you <S%H3427>spent<s%> [there].
